docs.snippet: John Moffitt, who walked away from about $1 million in salary from the 9-1 Broncos, said continuing to play for money was likely to injure him further and deepen his gloom....
docs.lead_paragraph: John Moffitt, who walked away from about $1 million in salary from the 9-1 Broncos, said continuing to play for money was likely to injure him further and deepen his gloom.
docs.abstract: John Moffitt, who walked away from about $1 million in salary from the 9-1 Denver Broncos, says continuing to play just for the money was likely to injure him further and deepen his gloom; says he feels free now that he has quit; Moffitt is unique in the league for openly discussing his injuries and the brutal reality of playing in the NFL.

headline.main: Quitting the N.F.L.: For John Moffitt, the Money Wasn’t Worth It

Newton Provides a Spark,

docs.lead_paragraph: The Giants were required to go to the team’s practice facility for only a weight-lifting session, but players decided to remain to prepare for the Dallas Cowboys.
docs.abstract: New York Giants, who are only required to go to the team’s practice facility for weight-lifting session, decide to remain at the team’s complex on their own to study film and conduct meetings inspired by their recent success and run-up to Dallas game.

headline.main: Giants Volunteer for Extra Cowboys Preparation

docs.snippet: By coincidence, the timing of our stylebook revisions dovetailed with the rebranding of our global editions as The International New York Times. As part of that integration, our colleagues in Paris, London and Hong Kong have made a Herculean effor...
docs.lead_paragraph: This week, a few more highlights from the recent revisions in The Times’s stylebook.
docs.abstract: By coincidence, the timing of our stylebook revisions dovetailed with the rebranding of our global editions as The International New York Times. As part of that integration, our colleagues in Paris, London and Hong Kong have made a Herculean effort to adopt our stylebook and largely eliminate the variations and exceptions The Herald Tribune had maintained.
